span.span: Provides a generic interface to a sequence of records.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面會提供記錄導向資料流的抽象介面。The interface provides an abstract interface to a record-oriented stream. 執行個體可以用來讀取和寫入記錄檔記錄。A instance can be used to read and write log records. 介面提供下列功能：The interface provides the following capabilities, - 使用 方法，附加記錄檔記錄。Append log records using the methods. - 使用 方法，讀取附加的記錄。Read the appended records using the method. - 使用 方法，寫入特殊的重新啟動記錄。Write a special restart record using the method. - 使用 方法，從最近寫入的重新啟動記錄中讀取重新啟動記錄。Read restart records from the most recently written restart record using the method. - 使用 方法，將記錄清除至永久性存放區。Flush the records to durable store using the method. - 保留空間以便附加記錄。Reserve space for appending records. - 將記錄檔基底往前移以釋放記錄空間。Free log space by advancing the base of the log. - 接收 事件通知以移動記錄檔基底來釋放空間。Receive event notifications to move the base of the log to free space. 記錄檔記錄會附加到 執行個體，而且每個記錄檔記錄會被賦予唯一的序號。Log records are appended to a instance, and each log record is given a unique sequence number. 序號會在指定的記錄順序中嚴謹地以固定方式增加。Sequence numbers are strictly monotonically increasing within a given record sequence. 記錄檔記錄由不透明的資料組成，這些資料是提供給位元組 ArraySegments 之 中的 執行個體。A log record consists of opaque data, supplied to the instance in an of ArraySegments of bytes. 介面也會公開一些提供記錄界限相關資訊的基本屬性。The interface also exposes a few basic properties which provides information about log boundaries. - 屬性包含記錄順序中第一個有效記錄的序號。The property contains the sequence number of the first valid record in the record sequence. - 屬性包含保證大於上一個附加記錄之序號的序號。The property contains a sequence number that is guaranteed to be larger than the sequence number of the last appended record. - 屬性包含最後一個寫入之重新啟動區域的序號。The property contains the sequence number of the last written restart area. - 屬性包含可在順序中附加或讀取之最大記錄的大小。The property contains the size of the largest record that can be appended to, or read from the sequence. - 屬性包含在此記錄順序中建立之所有保留區的總大小。The property contains the total size of all reservations made in this record sequence. - 如果 屬性設為 `true`，且 作業因為順序中沒有空間而失敗，則記錄順序會嘗試釋放空間，然後重試此「附加」作業。If the property is set to `true`, and an operation fails because there is no space in the sequence, the record sequence will attempt to free space, and retry the Append operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重新啟動區域可用來暫時儲存包含用戶端上一個檢查點作業的資訊。A restart area is used to temporarily store information containing a client's last checkpoint operation. 當需要復原時，您可以剖析重新啟動區域，以便從上一個檢查點作業擷取所有資料。When a recovery is necessary, you can parse the restart area to retrieve all the data from the last checkpoint operation. 這些資料會初始化異動資料表、中途分頁資料表和開啟檔案資料表，好讓它們可用於復原程序。This data initializes the transaction table, dirty pages table, and open file table so they can be used in the recovery process. 您可以使用 方法來讀取重新啟動區域。A restart area can be read using the method. 當寫入重新啟動區域時，位元組陣列區段中的資料會串連至單一位元組陣列，以便附加為記錄。When a restart area is written, the data in the byte array segments are concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record. 在讀取重新啟動區域時，不會將資料分割回陣列區段。No provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the restart area is read. 當這個方法成功完成時，基底序號已經更新。When this method successfully completes, the base sequence number has been updated. 只要是序號小於新基底序號的所有記錄都無法存取。All log records with sequence numbers less than the new base sequence number are inaccessible.
